title: Yasuo or ekko
body: Hello, so i have enough moneys to buy one of these champs but i just cant make a decision. I wanna one trick one of them, they both seem so fun and have carry potential both can be played mid and top which are my main roles. I JUST CANT DECIDE BOTH ARE GOODD, someone help meeee!

replies.body: You'll probably get a lot more worthwhile responses if you post this over in [Gameplay ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance)or [General Discussion](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-discussion), but I tend to enjoy more mage/bursty AP champs so I'd personally go with Ekko!
One trick twisted fate and play zed on the side
